text: businesses have found new ways to
leverage machine learning for
applications such as recommendation
engines object detection voice
assistance fraud detection and more
although the use of machine learning is
gaining traction long development time
high cost the need for agility and high
complexity are key barriers that prevent
use of machine learning from becoming
even more widespread for the fastest and
easiest way to get started using machine
learning AWS offers Amazon's sage maker
a fully managed machine learning service
for more customized machine learning
projects AWS machine learning
infrastructure delivers a range of
options to you
AWS machine learning infrastructure
services remove the barriers to adoption
of machine learning with cost-effective
high performance options that are agile
and easy to use for beginners and
experts alike with AWS ml infrastructure
organizations can get the right amounts
of compute storage and networking
performance for any use case in budget
for fast model training that reduces
training time from days to minutes EC 2
P 3 and P 3 DN instances offer the
highest performance GPU training
instances in the cloud for small scale
or entry-level machine learning training
ec2 G 4 instances can be a cost
effective solution for high performance
inference easy to influenced insane us
developed in ferengi accustomed chips
deliver high throughput and low latency
with the lowest cost per inference in
the cloud for GPU based inference ec2 G
for instances enable use of Nvidia
libraries for inference that uses Intel
avx-512 instructions ec2 C 5 instances
are a good solution for cost-effective
shared file storage of large amounts of
data needed to train models Amazon s3 is
a great solution to further increase
storage performance Amazon FS x4 luster
delivers shared file storage with high
throughput and consistent low latencies
AWS was first in the cloud to offer 100
gigabits per second per instance of
network bandwidth for large scale multi
node deployments elastic fabric adapter
provides a low latency low jitter
channel for inter instance
communications
for highly scalable kubernetes
orchestration you can use Amazon Elastic
kubernetes service to efficiently run
distributed training jobs in addition
AWS offers different pricing plans to
meet the needs of any organization
business conditions constantly change an
AWS ml infrastructure can change with it
whether it's scaling up or down as
needed choosing different ml frameworks
or changing geographic locations AWS ML
infrastructure can adapt to meet your
needs
the fastest way to get started using all
of this powerful machine learning
infrastructure is by using Amazon sage
maker Sage Maker enables you to develop
high quality models by providing all of
the components required for machine
learning in a fully managed experience
some models get to production faster
with much less effort and at lower cost
AWS provides the broadest selection of
machine learning compute networking and
storage infrastructure to meet the needs
of any machine learning initiative all
with the pay-as-you-go cost model to
learn more visit our website
[Music]
